name: Polkhawk, Bombastic Shot
effect: Ranged 2 (As long as this unit is distant, its attacks get +2.) Ranger Reaction cards you activate cost 1 less to activate.
effect_raw:
Ranged 2 (As long as this unit is distant, its attacks get +2 power.)
Ranger Reaction cards you activate cost 1 less to activate.
flavor: "Liven up! We'll all dance with the flames."

result_editions.effect: Ranged 2 Ranger Reaction cards you activate cost 1 less to activate.

editions.effect: Ranged 2 Ranger Reaction cards you activate cost 1 less to activate.

name: Nico, Whiplash Allure
effect: Whenever a card with floating memory is banished from your graveyard, put a lash counter on Nico. On Champion Hit: You may have that opponent put the top X cards of their deck into their graveyard, where X is the amount of lash counters on Nico.
effect_raw:
Whenever a card with floating memory is banished from your graveyard, put a lash counter on Nico.
On Champion Hit: You may have that opponent put the top X cards of their deck into their graveyard, where X is the amount of lash counters on Nico.

rule.description: If multiple cards with floating memory are banished from your graveyard at the same time, Nico's triggered ability triggers that many times.

name: Vanitas, Obliviate Schemer
effect: Vanitas can only level up into another "Vanitas" champion. On Enter: If there's another wind element card in Vanitas' lineage, glimpse 4.
effect_raw:
Vanitas can only level up into another "Vanitas" champion.
On Enter: If there's another wind element card in Vanitas' lineage, glimpse 4.
flavor: "With just a nudge, this seed will be ripe for harvest."

name: Vanitas, Convergent Ruin
effect: Vanitas Lineage Whenever you activate a Spell card, Vanitas' next attack without a weapon this turn gets +1. On Champion Hit: If 7 or more damage was dealt, cards that opponent materializes cost 1 more to materialize until the beginning of your next turn.
effect_raw:
Vanitas Lineage
Whenever you activate a Spell card, Vanitas' next attack without a weapon this turn gets +1 power.
On Champion Hit: If 7 or more damage was dealt, cards that opponent materializes cost 1 more to materialize until the beginning of your next turn.

name: Temporal Spectrometer
effect: Divine Relic : Put a time counter on Temporal Spectrometer. While paying for a memory cost, you may sacrifice Temporal Spectrometer to pay for X of that cost, where X is the amount of time counters on Temporal Spectrometer.
effect_raw:
Divine Relic
REST: Put a time counter on Temporal Spectrometer.
While paying for a memory cost, you may sacrifice Temporal Spectrometer to pay for X of that cost, where X is the amount of time counters on Temporal Spectrometer.

name: Magebane Lash
effect: Class BonusOn Enter: Put a lash counter on your champion. Magebane Lash gets +1 for each lash counter on your champion. Nico BonusWhenever your champion is dealt non-combat damage, recover 2.
effect_raw:
[Class Bonus] On Enter: Put a lash counter on your champion.
Magebane Lash gets +1 power for each lash counter on your champion.
[Nico Bonus] Whenever your champion is dealt non-combat damage, recover 2.

name: The Elysian Astrolabe
effect: Hindered (This object enters the field rested.) Materialize this card only if it's the last card in your material deck, and only if your starting material deck size was twelve. : Until end of turn, you may pay 0 rather than pay a card's starcalling costs. When you do, glimpse 5.
effect_raw:
Hindered (This object enters the field rested.) 
Materialize this card only if it's the last card in your material deck, and only if your starting material deck size was twelve.
REST: Until end of turn, you may pay 0 rather than pay a card's starcalling costs. When you do, glimpse 5.

rule.description: If you starcall a card, that card is put onto the stack during the glimpse effect. It does not start resolving until after the current effect finishes resolving. For example, Scry the Skies has you glimpse 4, you starcall a card, you finish resolving Scry the Skies by drawing a card into your memory, then the effects stack can start resolving more cards.
If this card is not in the material deck, it can't be played.

name: Gloamspire Lance
effect: Class BonusOn Hit: Deal X unpreventable damage to the hit unit, then recover X, where X is the amount of Curse cards in the attacker's lineage plus 1.
effect_raw: [Class Bonus] On Hit: Deal X unpreventable damage to the hit unit, then recover X, where X is the amount of Curse cards in the attacker's lineage plus 1.

name: The Eternal Kingdom
effect: Class BonusDomains you control have reservable. (While paying for a reserve cost, you may rest an object with reservable to pay for 1 of that cost.) Upkeep — At the beginning of your recollection phase, you may pay 2. If you don't, sacrifice The Eternal Kingdom.
effect_raw:
[Class Bonus] Domains you control have reservable. (While paying for a reserve cost, you may rest an object with reservable to pay for 1 of that cost.)
Upkeep — At the beginning of your recollection phase, you may pay 2. If you don't, sacrifice The Eternal Kingdom.

name: Scry the Stars
effect: Class BonusYou may banish a card named Scry the Skies from your graveyard rather than pay this card's reserve cost. Until end of turn, cards you look at while glimpsing have "Starcalling — X", where X is that card's reserve cost. Glimpse 3.
effect_raw:
[Class Bonus] You may banish a card named Scry the Skies from your graveyard rather than pay this card's reserve cost.
Until end of turn, cards you look at while glimpsing have "Starcalling — (X)", where X is that card's reserve cost. Glimpse 3.

rule.description: If you starcall a card, that card is put onto the stack during the glimpse effect. It does not start resolving until after the current effect finishes resolving. For example, Scry the Skies has you glimpse 4, you starcall a card, you finish resolving Scry the Skies by drawing a card into your memory, then the effects stack can start resolving more cards.

name: Neos Elemental
effect: Class BonusThis card costs 1 less to activate for each token object you control. Hindered (This ally enters the field rested.) Steadfast, Taunt, True Sight, Vigor Neos Elemental gets +1 and +1 for each token object you control.
effect_raw:
[Class Bonus] This card costs 1 less to activate for each token object you control.
Hindered (This ally enters the field rested.)
Steadfast, Taunt, True Sight, Vigor
Neos Elemental gets +1 power and +1 life for each token object you control.

name: Carter, Synthetic Reaper
effect: Class BonusCleave Whenever an ally dies, recover 1. On Enter: You may sacrifice another ally. If you do, Carter gets +2 until end of turn. If an Automaton ally was sacrificed this way, draw a card.
effect_raw:
[Class Bonus] Cleave
Whenever an ally dies, recover 1.
On Enter: You may sacrifice another ally you control. If you do, Carter gets +2 power until end of turn. If an Automaton ally was sacrificed this way, draw a card.

rule.title: ERRATA
rule.description: 'sacrifice another ally you control. -> sacrifice another ally.'

editions.effect: Class BonusCleave Whenever an ally dies, recover 1. On Enter: You may sacrifice another ally. If you do, Carter gets +2 until end of turn. If an Automaton ally was sacrificed this way, draw a card.

name: Accompanying Guard
effect: Class Bonus On Enter: Another target ally you control becomes fostered. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
effect_raw: [Class Bonus] On Enter: Another target ally you control becomes fostered. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
flavor: Determined to protect those in need, regardless if they are human or automaton.

name: Automated Gardener
effect: Class Bonus On Enter: Gather. (To gather, summon a Blightroot, Manaroot, Silvershine, Fraysia, Razorvine, or Springleaf token, chosen at random.)
effect_raw: [Class Bonus] On Enter: Gather. (To gather, summon a Blightroot, Manaroot, Silvershine, Fraysia, Razorvine, or Springleaf token, chosen at random.)
flavor: With such vast technological advances, not even drought can threaten a bountiful harvest.

name: Bombastic Sprint
effect: Your champion becomes distant. Polkhawk Bonus The next Ranger action card you activate this turn can be activated as though it had fast activation.
effect_raw:
Your champion becomes distant.
[Polkhawk Bonus] The next Ranger action card you activate this turn can be activated as though it had fast activation.
flavor: You can't outmatch or outgun the Hawk!

name: Dawn's Reversal
effect: Class Bonus As long as a card activation has been negated this turn, this card costs 4 less to activate. Glimpse LV. Deal LV damage to target unit.
effect_raw:
[Class Bonus] As long as a card activation has been negated this turn, this card costs 4 less to activate.
Glimpse LV. Deal LV damage to target unit.
flavor: The magnetic pull of the moon continues even when the sun breaks the horizon.

name: Focusing Round
effect: On Enter: Draw a card. 2, : Load Focusing Round into target unloaded Gun weapon you control. (As a weapon is used for an attack, all of its loaded cards are put into the attacker's intent.)
effect_raw:
On Enter: Draw a card.
(2), [REST]: Load Focusing Round into target unloaded Gun weapon you control. (As a weapon is used for an attack, all of its loaded cards are put into the attacker's intent.)

name: Fortifying Aroma
effect: This card costs 1 less to activate for each Herb you control. Put two buff counters on target ally. (Allies get +1 and +1 for each buff counter on them.)
effect_raw:
This card costs 1 less to activate for each Herb you control.
Put two buff counters on target ally. (Allies get +1 power and +1 life for each buff counter on them.)
flavor: Herbs offer benefits beyond medicinal uses.

name: Frozen Dismissal
effect: Class Bonus This card costs 1 less to activate. Negate target ally card activation unless its controller pays 4. Banish the card that had its activation negated this way.
effect_raw:
[Class Bonus] This card costs 1 less to activate.
Negate target ally card activation unless its controller pays (4). Banish the card that had its activation negated this way.
flavor: I think you need to cool off.

name: Galestream Insight
effect: Class Bonus This card costs 1 less to activate. Memory 4+ This card costs 1 less to activate. Look at the top six cards of your deck. You may reveal a Spell card from among them and put it into your memory. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.
effect_raw:
[Class Bonus] This card costs 1 less to activate. 
[Memory 4+] This card costs 1 less to activate. 
Look at the top six cards of your deck. You may reveal a Spell card from among them and put it into your memory. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

name: Gloamspire Prowler
effect: This card costs 3 less to activate as long as there are two or more Curse cards in your champion's lineage. Class Bonus On Death: Put Gloamspire Prowler on the bottom of your champion's lineage. Draw a card and recover 2. Inherited Effect: This object gets -2 .
effect_raw:
This card costs 3 less to activate as long as there are two or more Curse cards in your champion's lineage.
[Class Bonus] On Death: Put Gloamspire Prowler on the bottom of your champion's lineage. Draw a card and recover 2.
Inherited Effect: This object gets -2 life.

name: Horticounter
effect: As an additional cost to activate this card, sacrifice Y Herbs. Negate target card activation unless its controller pays X+Y. Banish the card that had its activation negated this way. When an activation is negated this way, glimpse 3.
effect_raw:
As an additional cost to activate this card, sacrifice Y Herbs.
Negate target card activation unless its controller pays (X+Y). Banish the card that had its activation negated this way. When an activation is negated this way, glimpse 3.

name: Imperial Panzer
effect: Foster (At the beginning of your recollection phase, if this ally hasn’t been dealt damage since the end of your previous turn, it becomes fostered.) Class Bonus As long as Imperial Panzer is fostered, it gets +1 and +2 , and has vigor.
effect_raw:
Foster (At the beginning of your recollection phase, if this ally hasn’t been dealt damage since the end of your previous turn, it becomes fostered.) 
[Class Bonus] As long as Imperial Panzer is fostered, it gets +1 power and +2 life, and has vigor.

name: Nico, Rapture's Embrace
effect: Nico can only level up into another "Nico" champion. On Enter: If there's another water element card in Nico's lineage, look at the top two cards of your deck. Put one of those cards into your graveyard and the other on the bottom of your deck.
effect_raw:
Nico can only level up into another "Nico" champion.
On Enter: If there's another water element card in Nico's lineage, look at the top two cards of your deck. Put one of those cards into your graveyard and the other on the bottom of your deck.

name: Perdition
effect: Class Bonus This card costs 2 less to activate. Each ally target opponent controls gains "On Death: Deal 1 damage to each unit you control" until end of turn. Then deal 1 damage to each ally that opponent controls.
effect_raw:
[Class Bonus] This card costs 2 less to activate.
Each ally target opponent controls gains "On Death: Deal 1 damage to each unit you control" until end of turn. Then deal 1 damage to each ally that opponent controls.

name: Polkhawk, Boisterous Riot
effect: Polkhawk can only level up into another "Polkhawk" champion. On Enter: If there's another fire element card in Polkhawk's lineage, the next Ranger ally card you activate this turn enters the field distant.
effect_raw:
Polkhawk can only level up into another "Polkhawk" champion.
On Enter: If there's another fire element card in Polkhawk's lineage, the next Ranger ally card you activate this turn enters the field distant.

name: Reconnaissance Scout
effect: Fast Activation Ranged 2 Class Bonus On Enter: Another target unit you control becomes distant. Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to that unit this turn.
effect_raw:
Fast Activation (You may activate this card at fast speed.)
Ranged 2
[Class Bonus] On Enter: Another target unit you control becomes distant. Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to that unit this turn.

name: Refabrication
effect: You may sacrifice two tokens rather than pay this card's reserve cost. If your influence is five or less, draw two cards. (A player's influence is equal to the total amount of cards in their hand and memory.)
effect_raw:
You may sacrifice two tokens rather than pay this card's reserve cost. 
If your influence is five or less, draw two cards. (A player's influence is equal to the total amount of cards in their hand and memory.)

name: Slash and Burn
effect: Class Bonus This card costs 1 less to activate. Gather. Then you may banish up to three fire element cards from your graveyard. For each card banished this way, gather.
effect_raw:
[Class Bonus] This card costs 1 less to activate.
Gather. Then you may banish up to three fire element cards from your graveyard. For each card banished this way, gather.
flavor: Nature gives even when it takes away.

name: Surging Undertow
effect: Class Bonus This card costs 2 less to activate. Put the top three cards of your deck into your graveyard. Then if there are three or more water element cards in your graveyard, choose a unit and it becomes distant.
effect_raw:
[Class Bonus] This card costs 2 less to activate.
Put the top three cards of your deck into your graveyard. Then if there are three or more water element cards in your graveyard, choose a unit and it becomes distant.

name: Temptation's Facade
effect: On Enter: Draw a card. Nico Bonus : Change the target of an activation that targets another non-champion object you control to Temptation's Facade.
effect_raw:
On Enter: Draw a card.
[Nico Bonus] [REST]: Change the target of an activation that targets another non-champion object you control to Temptation's Facade.

name: Vanitas, Dominus Rex
effect: Vanitas Lineage You may activate this card from your material deck. It costs 1 less to activate for every 3 damage your champion has dealt to other champions this turn. On Champion Hit: Cards that opponent materializes cost 1 more to materialize until the beginning of your next turn.
effect_raw:
Vanitas Lineage 
You may activate this card from your material deck. It costs 1 less to activate for every 3 damage your champion has dealt to other champions this turn.
On Champion Hit: Cards that opponent materializes cost 1 more to materialize until the beginning of your next turn.

name: Cosmic Bolt
effect: Starcalling — 2 (As you're looking at this card while glimpsing, you may activate it by paying this cost. If you do, put all other cards you're looking at on the bottom of your deck in any order.) Deal 4 damage to target unit plus an additional 2 for each card named Cosmic Bolt in your graveyard and banishment.
effect_raw:
Starcalling — 2 (As you're looking at this card while glimpsing, you may activate it by paying this cost. If you do, put all other cards you're looking at on the bottom of your deck in any order.)
Deal 4 damage to target unit plus an additional 2 for each card named Cosmic Bolt in your graveyard and banishment.

rule.description: If you starcall a card, that card is put onto the stack during the glimpse effect. It does not start resolving until after the current effect finishes resolving. For example, Scry the Skies has you glimpse 4, you starcall a card, you finish resolving Scry the Skies by drawing a card into your memory, then the effects stack can start resolving more cards.
